RELEASE: v0.4.0
DATE: 07-22-2021
BUILD: "rapt-33889352"
SKESA: 2.5.0
PGAPX: 2021-07-01.build5508

DESCRIPTION:

This release updated PGAPX to 2021-07-01.build5508, made improvements to SRA metadata parsing algorithms and fixed several bugs to make RAPT more robust. For standalone RAPT, '--rm' are added to the run command so that the container is removed upon exit.
